svg.content: <mxGraphModel dx="1258" dy="587" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="2" value="root Server" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=top;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-190" width="300" height="230" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="13" value="Virtual Machine" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=bottom;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-170" y="30" width="130" height="90" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="14" value="Virtual Machine" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=bottom;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-30" y="25" width="120" height="95" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="3" value="App 01" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=top;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-160" y="40" width="50" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="4" value="App 02" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=top;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-110" y="40" width="60" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="5" value="App 03" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=top;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-20" y="40" width="50" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="6" value="App 04" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=top;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="30" y="40" width="50" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="7" value="Great because:<br>- No overhead<br>- Maximum usage of resources<br><br>But still facing issues:<br>- How to replace this server<br>- Disaster Recovery<br>- if one application uses all resources all other applications have problems" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=top;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="120" y="25" width="230" height="140" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="8" value="Hardware" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-170" y="190" width="260" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="9" value="Operating system" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-170" y="160" width="260" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="10" value="Hypervisor" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-170" y="130" width="260" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="16" value="Operating System" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=middle;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-160" y="70" width="110" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="17" value="Operating System" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=middle;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-20" y="70" width="100" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>

div.div:
Great because:
- No overhead
- Maximum usage of resources
But still facing issues:
- How to replace this server
- Disaster Recovery
- if one application uses all resources all other applications have problems
